\newcommand{\ottpremise}[1]{ #1 \\}
\newenvironment{ottdefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]}{}
\newenvironment{ottfundefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]\begin{displaymath}\begin{array}{l}}{\end{array}\end{displaymath}}
\newcommand{\ottfunclause}[2]{ #1 \equiv #2 \\}

\newcommand{\ottmv}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottkw}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottsym}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\ottcom}[1]{\text{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottdrulename}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
\newcommand{\ottcomplu}[5]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2\in #3 #4 #5}}
\newcommand{\ottcompu}[3]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2<#3}}
\newcommand{\ottcomp}[2]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2}}
\newcommand{\ottgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottmetavartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{ll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\ottrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\ottprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\ottfirstprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottlongprodline}[2]{& & $#1$ & \multicolumn{4}{l}{$#2$}}
\newcommand{\ottfirstlongprodline}[2]{\ottlongprodline{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand{\ottbindspecprodline}[6]{\ottprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\ottprodnewline}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}
\newcommand{\ottafterlastrule}{\\}
\newcommand{\ottmetavars}{
\ottmetavartabular{
 $ \ottmv{typevar} ,\, \ottmv{X} ,\, \ottmv{Y} $ &  \\
 $ \ottmv{termvar} ,\, \ottmv{x} ,\, \ottmv{y} $ &  \\
 $ \ottmv{castvar} ,\, \ottmv{cx} ,\, \ottmv{cy} $ &  \\
 $ \mathit{label} ,\, \mathit{l} $ &  \\
 $ \mathit{int} ,\, \mathit{i} $ &  \\
}}

\newcommand{\otttyp}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{typ}  ,\ A  ,\ B  ,\ C  ,\ \mathsf{Char}  ,\ \mathsf{Bool}  ,\ \,?\,}{::=}{\ottcom{types}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{X}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{type variable}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Int} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{int}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{Top} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{top type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{A  \rightarrow  B}{}{}{}{\ottcom{function type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mu  \ottmv{X} . A }{}{\textsf{bind}\; \ottmv{X}\; \textsf{in}\; A}{}{\ottcom{recursive type}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  A  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottexp}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{exp}  ,\ e  ,\ v  ,\ u  ,\ v_f}{::=}{\ottcom{expressions}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{x}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{variable}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\top}{}{}{}{\ottcom{top}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathit{i}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{lit}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \lambda  \ottmv{x} : A .\, e }{}{\textsf{bind}\; \ottmv{x}\; \textsf{in}\; e}{}{\ottcom{abstraction with argument annotation}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{fix} ~ \ottmv{x} : A .\, e }{}{\textsf{bind}\; \ottmv{x}\; \textsf{in}\; e}{}{\ottcom{fixpoint}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{applications}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}  c  \ottsym{]}  e}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  e  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottmode}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{mode}  ,\ m}{::=}{\ottcom{modes}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \oplus }{}{}{}{\ottcom{positive}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ominus }{}{}{}{\ottcom{negative}}}

\newcommand{\ottcastop}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{castop}  ,\ c}{::=}{\ottcom{cast operators}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottmv{cx}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{cast variable}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{id} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{id operator}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \downarrow_{ A } }{}{}{}{\ottcom{unfold operator}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \uparrow_{ A } }{}{}{}{\ottcom{castdn}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ c_{{\mathrm{1}}} \rightarrow c_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{arrow operator}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ c_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \cdot  c_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{composition of a sequence of ops}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \mathsf{fix} ~  \ottmv{cx}  .\,  c }{}{\textsf{bind}\; \ottmv{cx}\; \textsf{in}\; c}{}{\ottcom{fixpoint}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  c  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottctx}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{ctx}  ,\ \Gamma}{::=}{\ottcom{term context}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \cdot }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma  ,  \ottmv{x}  :  A}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\otttctx}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{tctx}  ,\ \Delta}{::=}{\ottcom{type context}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \cdot }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Delta  ,  \ottmv{X}}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottcctx}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{cctx}  ,\ \mathbb{E}}{::=}{\ottcom{cast context}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{ \cdot }{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\mathbb{E}  ,  \ottmv{cx}  :  A  \hookrightarrow  B}{}{}{}{}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{(}  \mathbb{E}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\ottgrammar}{\ottgrammartabular{
\otttyp\ottinterrule
\ottexp\ottinterrule
\ottmode\ottinterrule
\ottcastop\ottinterrule
\ottctx\ottinterrule
\otttctx\ottinterrule
\ottcctx\ottafterlastrule
}}

% defnss
% defns WellFormedType
%% defn WFT
\newcommand{\ottdruleWFTXXtop}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{Top} }{%
{\ottdrulename{WFT\_top}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWFTXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Delta  \vdash   \mathsf{Int} }{%
{\ottdrulename{WFT\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWFTXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{X}  \in  \Delta }%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  \ottmv{X}}{%
{\ottdrulename{WFT\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWFTXXarrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  A}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  B}%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  A  \rightarrow  B}{%
{\ottdrulename{WFT\_arrow}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWFTXXrec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  ,  \ottmv{X}  \vdash  A}%
}{
\Delta  \vdash   \mu  \ottmv{X} . A }{%
{\ottdrulename{WFT\_rec}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnWFT}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Delta  \vdash  A$}{\ottcom{Well Formed Type}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWFTXXtop{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWFTXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWFTXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWFTXXarrow{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWFTXXrec{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsWellFormedType}{
\ottdefnWFT{}}

% defns WellFormedTypeEnv
%% defn WFTyE
\newcommand{\ottdruleWFTyEXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\vdash   \cdot }{%
{\ottdrulename{WFTyE\_empty}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWFTyEXXcons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\vdash  \Delta}%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{X}  \notin  \Delta }%
}{
\vdash  \Delta  ,  \ottmv{X}}{%
{\ottdrulename{WFTyE\_cons}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnWFTyE}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\vdash  \Delta$}{\ottcom{Well Formed Type Environment}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWFTyEXXempty{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWFTyEXXcons{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsWellFormedTypeEnv}{
\ottdefnWFTyE{}}

\newcommand{\ottdruleOrdXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \textsf{ord }   \mathsf{Int}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{Ord\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOrdXXtop}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \textsf{ord }   \mathsf{Top}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{Ord\_top}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOrdXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \textsf{ord }  \ottmv{X} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Ord\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleOrdXXrec}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \textsf{ord }  \ottsym{(}   \mu  \ottmv{X} . A   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Ord\_rec}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnordinary}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \textsf{ord }  A $}{\ottcom{Ordinary type}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOrdXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOrdXXtop{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOrdXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleOrdXXrec{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsOrdinary}{
\ottdefnordinary{}}

% defns TypCast
%% defn TypCast
\newcommand{\ottdruleTCastXXid}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  A}%
\ottpremise{ uniq  \mathbb{E} }%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \vdash  A  \hookrightarrow  A  :   \mathsf{id} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TCast\_id}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTCastXXarrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \vdash  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \hookrightarrow  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \vdash  B_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \hookrightarrow  B_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  c_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \vdash  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \rightarrow  B_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \hookrightarrow  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \rightarrow  B_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :   c_{{\mathrm{1}}} \rightarrow c_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TCast\_arrow}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTCastXXunfold}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash   \mu  \ottmv{X} . A }%
\ottpremise{ uniq  \mathbb{E} }%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \vdash   \mu  \ottmv{X} . A   \hookrightarrow  A  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{X}  \mapsto   \mu  \ottmv{X} . A   \ottsym{]}  :   \downarrow_{  \mu  \ottmv{X} . A  } }{%
{\ottdrulename{TCast\_unfold}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTCastXXfold}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash   \mu  \ottmv{X} . A }%
\ottpremise{ uniq  \mathbb{E} }%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \vdash  A  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{X}  \mapsto   \mu  \ottmv{X} . A   \ottsym{]}  \hookrightarrow   \mu  \ottmv{X} . A   :   \uparrow_{  \mu  \ottmv{X} . A  } }{%
{\ottdrulename{TCast\_fold}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTCastXXseq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \vdash  A  \hookrightarrow  B  :  c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \vdash  B  \hookrightarrow  C  :  c_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \vdash  A  \hookrightarrow  C  :   c_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \cdot  c_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TCast\_seq}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTCastXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  A}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  B}%
\ottpremise{ uniq  \mathbb{E} }%
\ottpremise{ A  \hookrightarrow  B  :  \ottmv{cx}  \in  \mathbb{E} }%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \vdash  A  \hookrightarrow  B  :  \ottmv{cx}}{%
{\ottdrulename{TCast\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTCastXXfix}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  ,  \ottmv{cx}  :  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \rightarrow  B_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \hookrightarrow  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \rightarrow  B_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \hookrightarrow  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  c_{{\mathrm{1}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  ,  \ottmv{cx}  :  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \rightarrow  B_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \hookrightarrow  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \rightarrow  B_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \vdash  B_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \hookrightarrow  B_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  c_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \vdash  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \rightarrow  B_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \hookrightarrow  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \rightarrow  B_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :   \mathsf{fix} ~  \ottmv{cx}  .\,  \ottsym{(}   c_{{\mathrm{1}}} \rightarrow c_{{\mathrm{2}}}   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{TCast\_fix}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnTypCast}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \vdash  A  \hookrightarrow  B  :  c$}{\ottcom{Typing Reduction Rules}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTCastXXid{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTCastXXarrow{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTCastXXunfold{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTCastXXfold{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTCastXXseq{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTCastXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTCastXXfix{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsTypCast}{
\ottdefnTypCast{}}

% defns WellFormedTermEnv
%% defn WFTmE
\newcommand{\ottdruleWFTmEXXempty}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\Delta  \vdash   \cdot }{%
{\ottdrulename{WFTmE\_empty}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleWFTmEXXcons}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  \Gamma}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  A}%
\ottpremise{ \ottmv{x}  \notin  \Gamma }%
}{
\Delta  \vdash  \Gamma  ,  \ottmv{x}  :  A}{%
{\ottdrulename{WFTmE\_cons}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnWFTmE}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Delta  \vdash  \Gamma$}{\ottcom{Well Formed Term Environment}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWFTmEXXempty{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleWFTmEXXcons{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsWellFormedTermEnv}{
\ottdefnWFTmE{}}

% defns Typing
%% defn Typing
\newcommand{\ottdruleTypingXXint}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\vdash  \Delta}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  \Gamma}%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  \vdash  \mathit{i}  :   \mathsf{Int} }{%
{\ottdrulename{Typing\_int}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTypingXXvar}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\vdash  \Delta}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \vdash  \Gamma}%
\ottpremise{\ottmv{x}  :  A \, \in \, \Gamma}%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottmv{x}  :  A}{%
{\ottdrulename{Typing\_var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTypingXXabs}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  ,  \ottmv{x}  :  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \vdash  e  :  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  \vdash   \lambda  \ottmv{x} : A_{{\mathrm{1}}} .\, e   :  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \rightarrow  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Typing\_abs}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTypingXXapp}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  :  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \rightarrow  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A_{{\mathrm{1}}}}%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  \vdash  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  :  A_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Typing\_app}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTypingXXfix}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  ,  \ottmv{x}  :  A  \vdash  e  :  A}%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  \vdash   \mathsf{fix} ~ \ottmv{x} : A .\, e   :  A}{%
{\ottdrulename{Typing\_fix}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleTypingXXcast}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  \vdash  e  :  A}%
\ottpremise{\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \vdash  A  \hookrightarrow  B  :  c}%
}{
\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  \vdash  \ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}  c  \ottsym{]}  e  :  B}{%
{\ottdrulename{Typing\_cast}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnTyping}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$\Delta  \ottsym{;}  \mathbb{E}  \ottsym{;}  \Gamma  \vdash  e  :  A$}{\ottcom{Typing rules}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTypingXXint{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTypingXXvar{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTypingXXabs{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTypingXXapp{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTypingXXfix{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleTypingXXcast{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsTyping}{
\ottdefnTyping{}}

% defns Values
%% defn value
\newcommand{\ottdruleVXXlit}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \textsf{value }  \mathit{i} }{%
{\ottdrulename{V\_lit}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleVXXabs}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \textsf{value }  \ottsym{(}   \lambda  \ottmv{x} : A .\, e   \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{V\_abs}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleVXXfold}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \textsf{value }  e }%
}{
 \textsf{value }  \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}   \uparrow_{ A }   \ottsym{]}  e  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{V\_fold}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleVXXarrow}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \textsf{value }  e }%
}{
 \textsf{value }  \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}   c_{{\mathrm{1}}} \rightarrow c_{{\mathrm{2}}}   \ottsym{]}  e  \ottsym{)} }{%
{\ottdrulename{V\_arrow}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnvalue}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \textsf{value }  e $}{\ottcom{Values}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleVXXlit{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleVXXabs{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleVXXfold{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleVXXarrow{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsValues}{
\ottdefnvalue{}}

% defns Reduction
%% defn Reduction
\newcommand{\ottdruleRedXXbeta}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{(}   \lambda  \ottmv{x} : A .\, e   \ottsym{)} \, e'  \hookrightarrow  e  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \mapsto  e'  \ottsym{]}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Red\_beta}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedXXappl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \hookrightarrow  e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}%
}{
e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \hookrightarrow  e'_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Red\_appl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedXXappr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \textsf{value }  v_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \hookrightarrow  e'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}%
}{
v_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \hookrightarrow  v_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, e'_{{\mathrm{2}}}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Red\_appr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedXXfix}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \mathsf{fix} ~ \ottmv{x} : A .\, e   \hookrightarrow  e  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{x}  \mapsto   \mathsf{fix} ~ \ottmv{x} : A .\, e   \ottsym{]}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Red\_fix}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedXXcastXXarr}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottsym{(}  \ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}   c_{{\mathrm{1}}} \rightarrow c_{{\mathrm{2}}}   \ottsym{]}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{)} \, e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \hookrightarrow  \ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}  c_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  e_{{\mathrm{1}}} \, \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}   \neg  c_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \ottsym{]}  e_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Red\_cast\_arr}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedXXcastXXseq}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}   c_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \cdot  c_{{\mathrm{2}}}   \ottsym{]}  e  \hookrightarrow  \ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}  c_{{\mathrm{2}}}  \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}  c_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \ottsym{]}  e  \ottsym{)}}{%
{\ottdrulename{Red\_cast\_seq}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedXXcast}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{e  \hookrightarrow  e'}%
}{
\ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}  c  \ottsym{]}  e  \hookrightarrow  \ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}  c  \ottsym{]}  e'}{%
{\ottdrulename{Red\_cast}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedXXcastelim}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \textsf{value }  v }%
}{
\ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}   \downarrow_{ A }   \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{(}  \ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}   \uparrow_{ A }   \ottsym{]}  v  \ottsym{)}  \hookrightarrow  v}{%
{\ottdrulename{Red\_castelim}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedXXcastid}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \textsf{value }  v }%
}{
\ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}   \mathsf{id}   \ottsym{]}  v  \hookrightarrow  v}{%
{\ottdrulename{Red\_castid}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleRedXXcastfix}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
\ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}   \mathsf{fix} ~  \ottmv{cx}  .\,  c   \ottsym{]}  e  \hookrightarrow  \ottkw{cast} \, \ottsym{[}  c  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{cx}  \mapsto   \mathsf{fix} ~  \ottmv{cx}  .\,  c   \ottsym{]}  \ottsym{]}  e}{%
{\ottdrulename{Red\_castfix}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnReduction}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$e  \hookrightarrow  e'$}{\ottcom{Reduction rules}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedXXbeta{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedXXappl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedXXappr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedXXfix{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedXXcastXXarr{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedXXcastXXseq{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedXXcast{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedXXcastelim{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedXXcastid{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleRedXXcastfix{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsReduction}{
\ottdefnReduction{}}

% defns SyntacticSubTerm
%% defn SynSub
\newcommand{\ottdruleSSubXXrefl}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 A  \subset  A }{%
{\ottdrulename{SSub\_refl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSSubXXunfold}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ A  \subset  B  \ottsym{[}  \ottmv{X}  \mapsto   \mu  \ottmv{X} . B   \ottsym{]} }%
}{
 A  \subset   \mu  \ottmv{X} . B  }{%
{\ottdrulename{SSub\_unfold}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSSubXXarrowL}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ A  \subset  B_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
}{
 A  \subset  B_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \rightarrow  B_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{SSub\_arrowL}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSSubXXarrowR}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ A  \subset  B_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
}{
 A  \subset  B_{{\mathrm{1}}}  \rightarrow  B_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{SSub\_arrowR}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnSynSub}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ A  \subset  B $}{\ottcom{A is a Syntactic Subterm of B}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSSubXXrefl{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSSubXXunfold{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSSubXXarrowL{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSSubXXarrowR{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsSyntacticSubTerm}{
\ottdefnSynSub{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsWellFormedType
\ottdefnsWellFormedTypeEnv
\ottdefnsOrdinary
\ottdefnsTypCast
\ottdefnsWellFormedTermEnv
\ottdefnsTyping
\ottdefnsValues
\ottdefnsReduction
\ottdefnsSyntacticSubTerm
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}
